text: He mominaharu! Allahako nimti satyama kayama rahadai, satya nisthaka satha saksi bana. Ra kunai jatiko satruta timila'i n'yayako margabata vicalita nagaros, uniharusita n'yaya garne gara, kinabhane yahi nai sanyamako najika huncha, ra allaha sita dara. Visvasa gara ki allahala'i timra sampurna krayakalapaharubare ramrari jnana cha
